title: User Registration with OTP Verification
description: Verify that a new user can register and authenticate via OTP sent to their phone number.

steps.description: Navigate to registration page
Submit valid phone number and initiate OTP sending
Check OTP is sent successfully
Enter correct OTP code
Verify user account is created and logged in

title: User Login Failure with Invalid OTP
description: Confirm that login fails when an invalid OTP is entered during phone verification.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Submit valid phone number to receive OTP
Enter incorrect OTP code
Ensure authentication fails with appropriate error message

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Ensure that users with different roles (Admin, Designer, User, Sales Manager, Area Manager) have appropriate access rights.

steps.description: Login as Admin and navigate to admin-only pages
Verify access is granted
Login as Designer and attempt to access admin-only pages
Verify access is denied
Login as User and access user profile and order pages
Verify access is granted

title: Order Creation and Designer Assignment
description: Test that a logged-in user can create an order and that sales or area manager can assign it to a designer successfully.

steps.description: Login as a normal user
Navigate to order creation form
Fill in all required order details and submit
Verify order is created and listed under user's orders
Login as sales or area manager
Assign the new order to a designer
Confirm the order designer assignment is reflected in the system

title: Designer Draft Submission and User Approval Flow
description: Validate order draft submission by designer and user's ability to accept or reject the draft.

steps.description: Login as assigned designer
Submit a draft for assigned order
Ensure the draft is saved and user is notified
Login as the user who placed the order
View the submitted draft and accept it
Confirm order status is updated to accepted
Repeat and reject a draft
Verify order status is updated to rejected and designer notified

title: Designer Registration and Profile Update
description: Test the designer registration workflow and ability to update their profile including regional assignments.

steps.description: Navigate to designer registration form
Submit valid registration details
Verify designer account is created and listed in designer directory
Login as registered designer
Navigate to profile edit page and update profile information including regional assignment
Confirm profile changes are saved and reflected in the system

title: Designer Rating Submission and Viewing
description: Verify that users can submit ratings for designers and ratings are displayed correctly.

steps.description: Login as a user
Submit a rating for a designer after order completion
Check that the rating is saved and aggregated rating of the designer updates
Navigate to designer listing page
Verify designer ratings are visible and accurate

title: Product Listing and Category Filtering
description: Test product catalog display and the ability to filter products by category dynamically.

steps.description: Navigate to products page
Verify list of products and categories are displayed
Select a product category to filter
Confirm only products belonging to selected category are shown
Access detailed view of a product
Verify all product details are displayed correctly

title: Installment Payment Status Update and Receipt Upload
description: Verify installment payment updates including status changes and uploading payment receipts work correctly.

steps.description: Login as user or designer
Update installment payment status to paid or pending
Confirm the status updates are saved and shown correctly
Upload payment receipt document for an installment
Verify receipt upload succeeds and is accessible

title: Manufacturing and Installation Status Flow
description: Test manufacturing start, finish and installation start, complete statuses are updated and tracked properly.

steps.description: Login as designer
Start manufacturing process for a designated order
Confirm manufacturing status is updated to started
Mark manufacturing as finished
Verify manufacturing is marked complete
Start installation for the order
Confirm installation status is updated to started
Complete installation
Verify installation is marked complete and order is updated accordingly

title: Real-Time Notification Delivery and Management
description: Ensure users and designers receive real-time notifications for order updates and system events, and can view and delete them.

steps.description: Trigger order status change for a user's order
Confirm user receives notification immediately
User views notifications list
Notifications are listed with correct details
User deletes a single notification
Verify notification is removed from the list
User triggers delete all read notifications
All read notifications are deleted and no longer visible

title: Support Ticket Submission and Tracking via Contact Form
description: Validate user can submit support requests through contact form and track open tickets.

steps.description: Navigate to contact form page
Submit a support request with valid details
Confirm ticket is created and success message displayed
Login as user and check support ticket status
Verify ticket is listed with correct details and status

title: User Profile Editing and Persistence
description: Test that users and designers can update their profile information and changes persist correctly.

steps.description: Login as a user
Navigate to profile edit page
Update personal information fields and submit changes
Verify updates are saved and reflected after page reload

title: Frontend Localization Language Switching
description: Confirm that the website dynamically switches between Arabic and English languages on user request.

steps.description: Navigate to homepage
Switch site language to Arabic
Verify all visible text changes to Arabic and layout adjusts if needed
Switch site language back to English
Verify all text reverts to English correctly

title: Error Handling for Invalid Order Data Submission
description: Verify the system handles submission of invalid or incomplete order data gracefully with proper error messages.

steps.description: Login as user and open order creation form
Submit the form with missing required fields
Verify validation errors are displayed for missing fields
Submit the form with invalid data types or formats
Ensure system rejects invalid input with explanatory error messages
